diff.description: Compare two JSON objects and find their differences

error.invalid: Invalid JSON in one or both inputs

diff.title: JSON Diff

input.title: Input Format
input.description: Enter two JSON objects to compare. The left input is considered the original JSON, and the right input is the modified version.

output.title: Comparison Results
output.description: The tool will display added, removed, and modified properties between the two JSON objects, with color-coded indicators for easy identification.

list.title: Available Features
list.export-options: Export results as JSON or CSV
list.file-upload: File upload support for both inputs
list.detailed-view: Detailed view of changes with old and new values

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices

list.title: Usage Tips
list.validate-first: Validate both JSON objects before comparing
list.organize-json: Keep your JSON structures consistent for better comparison
list.use-export: Use export feature to save and share differences
list.check-paths: Pay attention to property paths in nested structures
list.large-files: For large files, use the file upload feature instead of pasting

tips.note: Note: The diff tool helps you identify structural and value changes between two JSON objects. No data is stored on our servers.

formatter.description: Format and validate your JSON data with advanced tools.
formatter.title: JSON Formatter

input.title: Input Format
input.description: Paste your unformatted JSON into the input field. You can also upload a JSON file using the upload button.

output.title: Output Format
output.description: The formatted JSON will be displayed in the output field with proper indentation and syntax highlighting.

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices

list.title: Usage Tips
list.validate-first: Always validate your JSON before using it in production
list.use-file-upload: Use file upload for large JSON files
list.check-errors: Pay attention to error messages for quick debugging
list.download-backup: Download a backup of your formatted JSON
list.large-files: For very large files, consider splitting them into smaller chunks

tips.note: Note: The formatter preserves all data while improving readability. No data is stored on our servers.

minifier.description: Minify and compress your JSON data
minifier.title: JSON Minifier

input.title: Input Format
input.description: Enter your formatted JSON data in the input field. The minifier will remove all unnecessary whitespace and formatting while preserving the data structure.

process.title: Minification Process
process.description: The minifier removes all unnecessary whitespace, newlines, and indentation while maintaining the JSON structure and data integrity.

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices

list.title: Usage Tips
list.backup: Keep a backup of the original formatted JSON
list.check-size: Compare file sizes before and after minification
list.large-files: For large files, use the file upload feature

tips.note: Note: The minifier preserves your data structure while removing unnecessary formatting. No data is stored on our servers.

validator.description: Validate your JSON data with advanced tools.
validator.title: JSON Validator

input.title: Input Format
input.description: Enter your JSON data in the input field. You can paste directly, upload a file, or use the sample data button to get started.

validation.title: Validation Process
validation.description: The validator checks for proper JSON syntax, including correct quotes, commas, and brackets. It will highlight any errors found in your JSON.

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices

list.title: Usage Tips
list.check-quotes: Ensure all strings are enclosed in double quotes
list.common-errors: Watch for missing commas and extra commas at the end of lists
list.use-sample: Use the sample data to understand correct JSON structure
list.error-messages: Pay attention to error messages for quick fixes
list.large-files: For large files, consider using the file upload feature

tips.note: Note: Our validator ensures your JSON is syntactically correct and follows the JSON specification. No data is stored on our servers.

parser.title: JSON Parser & Stringify
parser.description: Convert between JSON strings and formatted objects with ease

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The JSON Parser & Stringify tool helps you convert between JSON strings and JSON objects. It supports both parsing JSON strings into formatted objects and stringifying objects into JSON format.

parse.title: JSON parse
parse.description: Convert a JSON string into a formatted object. This mode helps you validate and format JSON strings.

stringify.title: JSON stringify
stringify.description: Convert a JSON string into a formatted object. This mode helps you validate and format JSON strings.

list.1: Parse JSON strings into formatted objects
list.2: Stringify JSON objects into JSON format

list.1: Indent Size: Choose between 2, 4, or 8 spaces for formatting
list.2: Escape Unicode: Convert Unicode characters to \uXXXX format
list.3: Remove Whitespace: Output minified JSON without spaces or newlines

list.1: Use the 'Load Example' button to see sample inputs
list.2: In Stringify mode, you can use JavaScript object notation with single quotes and unquoted keys
list.3: The tool automatically formats the output with proper indentation
list.4: Copy the output directly to clipboard with the copy button
list.5: Check error messages for validation issues in your input
